title: PS5 Pro Details Leak - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.29.24
description:
Head over to Kindafunny.com/DragonAge to listen and subscribe to Dragon Age: Vows & Vengeance!

Follow Ronell at http://twitter.com/8BitClosedFist

After, KFGD, you’ll get:
A Kinda Funny GAMESCAST where Tim will join the two of us to talk about what we’ve been playing
For KF Members, You can also get today’s Gregway
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Karl Jacobs & Delaney Twining

KFGD082924
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:08 - Housekeeping
The Roper Report   -
00:06:00 - PS5 Pro Details Leak (Bilbilkun via Dealabs)
00:18:09 - Remedy and Annapurna announce a strategic cooperation agreement on Control 2 (Remedy Games Blog)
00:24:40 - No space for Dino Crisis when Monster Hunter exists, says Shinji Mikami (Ed nightingale at Eurogamer)
00:33:26 - Ad  
00:35:30 - Dragon Age The Veilguard PC Features (EA Blog)
00:45:35 - First look at Clair Obscur Expedition 33 Gameplay 
00:53:18 - Batman: Arkham Shadow Preview Round-Up (A Few days old, but we haven’t covered)
00:58:00 - Wee News!
01:00:30 - SuperChats
01:03:45 - You‘re Wrong
